stance_1: Eating meat is part of my diet
stance_2: I eat meat almost every night
justification: Eating meat being part of the diet directly supports eating meat almost every night, as stated by the interviewee.

stance_1: Eating meat is part of my diet
stance_2: Most people I know eat meat
justification: The social environment where most people eat meat may implicitly reinforce the interviewee's view that eating meat is a normal part of the diet.

stance_2: I eat meat almost every night
justification: The interviewee states that being a philosophical Buddhist leads them to consider their actions, implying some conflict with eating meat almost every night.
